greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A051731 + A127448 - I where I is the Identity matrix (A023531).
formula: T(n,k)=k*A008683(n/k)+1 if k divides n and k<n, T(n,k)=n for k=n, and T(n,k)=0 otherwise. - _Max Alekseyev_, Jan 07 2015
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
1, 1, 0, -3, 0, 0, 0, 8; [Typo corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 22 2010]
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 05 2007
